div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 897 Trastikovo, Burgas district, Bulgaria, 1911 Burial: c. 125 B.C. (T) Contents: 30 AR Alexander III: 26 late post. tetradr. (Me- sembria 11, Odessus 15) Macedonia, 1st Region: 4 tetradr. Disposition: Varna Gerasimov, BullSocArchVarna 10 (1956), p. 73
